video.title: AJIN: Demi-Human
video.synopsis: A teenager discovers that he is an Ajin and flees before the authorities experiment on him. Other Ajin plan to fight back and he must choose a side.

episodes.synopsis: After discovering he's an immortal "Ajin," Kei Nagai knows he'll be hunted. So he reaches out to the only person he can trust.
episodes.title: What's that stuff have to do with us?

episodes.synopsis: As Tosaki takes charge of the government's search for the new Ajin, Kei and Kaito are attacked by thugs who are eager to claim the reward money.
episodes.title: Why is this happening? Why me….

episodes.synopsis: Kei begins to embrace his abilities as an Ajin after being driven off the road by a motorcyclist. Izumi visits Kei's sister to learn about his past.
episodes.title: Maybe this is the end?

episodes.synopsis: Izumi fights back against the figure in Eriko's hospital room. After parting ways with Kaito, Kei receives a mysterious invitation.
episodes.title: Have you ever seen a black ghost?

episodes.synopsis: As Kei suffers through horrific experiments at a government lab, Tanaka urges him to unleash his dark side. Meanwhile, Sato plots a rescue mission.
episodes.title: But when it comes down to it, you still want them to help you... You’re the worst kind of trash…

episodes.synopsis: When Sato begins slaughtering workers at the lab, Kei jumps in to stop him and learns that Ajin have one key vulnerability.
episodes.title: I'm gonna kill you too

episodes.synopsis: With his job on the line, Tosaki resorts to extreme measures to learn more about Ajin. Sato seizes the public spotlight to set a new plan in motion.
episodes.title: I swear I'll cover the whole thing up

episodes.synopsis: When Sato reveals his gruesome plans, a young Ajin named Ko balks and flees. Kei finds refuge in the countryside and practices summoning his "ghost."
episodes.title: Brace yourselves

episodes.synopsis: As Sato prepares to launch his attacks, Ko stumbles on Kei's hiding place and begs for help. Tosaki gets a surprise visitor.
episodes.title: Wait, let's talk it over

episodes.synopsis: Tosaki uncovers new details about the "black ghosts." Meanwhile, Mrs. Yamanaka's neighbors grow suspicious of Kei, and Sato finalizes his plan.
episodes.title: They start to decay as soon as they're created

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the promised attacks, a shocking scene unfolds in the city. Sato prepares for a showdown with the elite Special Assault Team.
episodes.title: It's show time

episodes.synopsis: With the whole nation watching via the live stream, Tosaki deploys a new tactic to stop Sato. In the village, Kei's cover is blown.
episodes.title: Whew, I'm beat

episodes.synopsis: Cornered by police, Kei summons his invisible black matter in a desperate bid to escape with Ko. Sato announces the next wave of his war on humanity.
episodes.title: Sato, it’s all your fault!
